title: Until Her Smile
description: I was content with being a bachelor, never planned on settling down. Why would I, when every woman in my life, starting with my own mother, always walked out and never looked back.I liked my strict Army life—all I needed after my deployment was a vacation and time with my dad.  Then it all changed…One beautiful songwriter.One chance meeting.One last first kiss.One smile.Her smile.That was all it took to captivate me and send my world spinning on its axis. After that, I knew I’d never be the same.
author: Samantha Lind
